body.$invariant:
Product Page vs Content Page

A product page has specific product fields built into the page itself. This has been intentionally done so that all key e-commerce details for a product are kept associated in a central location. This data is different to content based components that normal pages are constructed of. 

The product page still support normal content page based sub-components. These can be placed at the Top and the Bottom of the built-in product page components. The built-in page components come standard on every product page. 

By adding a _components folder under the product page additional content based components can be added to the page as well. 

Example of a Top component. This component is placed above the built in product page body.

Example of a Bottom component. This component is placed below the built in product page body.
